allow: Bash(python -c " import json with open\(''Build Agentic AI Workflows Using LangGraph.ipynb'', ''r''\) as f: nb = json.load\(f\) # Extract cell contents cells = nb[''cells''] for i, cell in enumerate\(cells\): if cell[''cell_type''] == ''code'': source = ''''.join\(cell[''source'']\) if any\(keyword in source for keyword in [''search_flights_tool'', ''get_current_date_tool'', ''simple_math_tool'', ''search_hotels_tool'', ''build_graph_one_tool'']\): print\(f''\\n=== CELL {i} ===''\) print\(source[:1500]\) ")
